text: What Python features will excite the interest of a C# developer?
For someone who’s been happily programming in C# for quite some time now and planning to learn a new language I find the Python community more closely knit than many others.
Personally dynamic typing puts me off, but I am fascinated by the way the Python community rallies around it.
There are a lot of other things I expect I would miss in Python (LINQ, expression trees, etc.
What are the good things about Python that developers love?
Stuff that’ll excite me more than C#.
